author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: 'Don't short America' — Ken Langone says coronavirus mitigation efforts are working
description: The Republican billionaire praised the health-care industry, public service workers and drug companies but bashed the media regarding the coronavirus.
content:
Republican billionaire Ken Langone praised the health-care industry, public service workers and drug companies in the fight against the coronavirus but bashed the news media.
In an interview Monday on CNBC's "Squawk Box," Langone said the media's coverage of… [+1337 chars]
